name: Electrium
description:
After World War V in 2145, humanity almost face the extinction due to atomic war...

You are part of a small group of survivors that were left in a world with no electricity what so ever...

A few months after this apocalypse, you start noticing that some crystals created by the radiation, started to create sparks of energy...

After that you will have to use your abilities of engineer to bring electricity again to the whole world by connecting pillars with each other using capacitors...

Made by Projeckt Red

Danilo Chaves

Leonardo Lizano

Kevin Solano

Randald Villegas
